name: Return Cracked.com to its former glory
description:
Cracked.com flipped the switch on its style change on July 1st.
But hey! A quick fix (lulz) restores most of its most prominent ugliness away!
additional_info:
Really, this just reverts the font changes on the body and headings (I don't ever look at any of the other text, so I don't even begin to care about it) and restores the background. It accepts the majority of the changes as "pretty much okay", so if you're looking for a complete revert, you'll want to look elsewhere.

Now accommodates the new persistent header.
